DOC.brief_summary: Compare activity 5 mg levocetirizine 5 mg desloratadine allergen-induced wheal flare reaction .
DOC.brief_title: Wheal Flare Reaction During 24 Hours Allergic Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: Male female allergic volunteer : Diagnosed allergy base medical history positivity skin test least one standardized allergen include grass pollen , tree pollen , house dust mite , cat dog dander positive RAST specific select allergen ≥ class 2 Pregnancy lactate female , female childbearing potential without reliable contraception History presence chronic acute illness disorder capable alter absorption , metabolism elimination drug , constitute risk factor take trial medication Heavy caffeine drinker ( > 5 cup coffee , tea , cola , etc … per day ) Any drug treatment , include prescribe nonprescription medicine ( except hormonal contraceptive postmenopausal hormonal replacement therapy females occasional use paracetamol exceed 2 g/day maximum dose 10 g per 14 day ) , take 14 day study drug administration ; washout period intake systemic corticosteroid least 4 week Known allergy/intolerance study drug medicine chemically related study drug excipients ( lactose , cellulose ... ) Participation another clinical trial , blood donation significant blood loss ( > 450 mL ) less 12 week study drug administration Skin irritant 48 hour UV exposure visit Immunotherapy receive current year Any clinical condition , opinion Investigator , would make subject unsuitable trial
